name: Mark McConnell
body:
## Mark McConnell
An Irish Gem and one of Melbourne's rising stars of comedy is back, with his stand up comedy show as part of the 2016 Melbourne International Comedy Festival.

**Ten nights only!**
March - Tue 29th, Wed 30th, Thur 31st, 

April - Fri 1st, Sat 2nd , Tue 5th, Wed 6th, Thur 7th, Fri 8th , Final Show - Sat 9th

[Book Tickets Here](http://www.trybooking.com/170498)

Mark McConnell is the sexiest Irish man that's alive today. He's also a great comedian, 

> Literally just pissed my pants  - Random Old Man.


His surrealist yarns are comedic gems to behold and share at the water cooler the next day. 

### Venue

Glamp Cocktail Bar,
267 Little Collins Street,
Melbourne, Victoria 3000

Contact Details:
Mark Mc Connell- 0459 391 472 
markmcc2010@gmail.com
